overview:
Marleen Vercammen* (1961) joined Saffelberg Investments in 2008 as Chief Financial Officer. In this capacity she is in charge of the financial and legal management of the group’s various investments. Marleen joined ARINSO International in September 2000 as Chief Financial Officer and Director. She successfully managed the consolidation, reporting, budgeting, control processes and legal affairs for some 50 affiliates in 27 countries.

Marleen has over 15 years of financial and audit experience at KPMG, a leading international service organisation in the fields of audit, accountancy, tax service and consultancy, where she started in 1985. In 1989 she continued as a statutory auditor and was promoted to audit partner in 1998.

Throughout her career she served many national and international clients, a number of which are stock quoted. Marleen Vercammen holds a university degree in applied economics, specialising in accountancy from the University of Antwerp (UFSIA, 1984).
